summary: All five requirements are implemented in the diff. REQ-1 (remove admin nav link) is done in Header.tsx. REQ-2 (AdminLoginPage with hardcoded credentials, session storage, error handling) is implemented in AdminLoginPage.tsx. REQ-3 (AdminProtectedRoute guard + logout button in AdminDashboardPage) is covered by the new AdminProtectedRoute component and updated AdminDashboardPage. REQ-4 (LoginPage with both Sign In and Sign Up via Internet Identity) is implemented in LoginPage.tsx. REQ-5 (App.tsx router with /admin/login and guarded /admin routes) is implemented in App.tsx. No significant hallucinated features were found.
